Ok Robo and I controled the Predacons and his main characters are Jiaxus, L=
ord elder, Kup and Hot rod (aka Rodimus); since we dont have heard about hi=
m in awhile and he said in his last mail: "Untill then I'm sure people here=
 will be able to manage the storylines and my characters. Preston, I'll lea=
ve Rodimus to you so you can finish out the plans we had."   

My sugestion=
 is that we control his main chars in order to keep story flowing and the t=
oon that we take control off dont be so close to our main character, By exa=
mple, Preston cna control Rodimus; Kraftlos or Sandy can control Kup or Jia=
xius  and me control Lord elder.

it's an idea and i want to know your opin=
ion.
